contactCta.question: Didn't find the answer to your question?

questions.q: How long does the urban transformation process take?
questions.a: The urban transformation process typically takes 3-5 years to complete. This duration may vary depending on the project size, number of stakeholders, and municipal approval processes.

questions.q: Who covers the costs in urban transformation?
questions.a: Generally, the contractor company covers all project costs. Stakeholders typically do not make any payments and receive ownership of their new units.

questions.q: How are rights determined in urban transformation?
questions.a: Rights are determined based on the value, location, and square meters of the existing property. A fair assessment is made by professional valuation firms.

questions.q: How long does it take to prepare a property valuation report?
questions.a: A standard property valuation report is delivered within 3-7 business days. Expedited valuation service is also available for urgent cases.
Our CMB-licensed valuation reports are valid at all banks, courts, and official institutions. They can be used for loans, mortgages, sales, and legal transactions.

questions.q: How is the valuation fee determined?
questions.a: Pricing varies according to the type, size, and location of the property. You can have a free preliminary meeting for detailed information.

questions.q: What does construction consultancy service cover?
questions.a: It covers project management, quality control, cost optimization, time planning, and technical supervision services.

questions.q: What types of projects do you work on?
questions.a: We provide consultancy services for residential, commercial, industrial, and mixed-use projects.
Fees are determined based on project scope, duration, and complexity. The initial meeting and preliminary assessment are free.
We actively serve in all districts of Istanbul. Special projects in other cities can also be considered.

questions.q: Do you provide online consultancy service?
questions.a: Yes, we also offer remote consultancy service through online meetings and digital documents.
